title: Witch Way To Go: Twisted Paths Into The Night
description: Ghosts, aliens, cryptids, and supernatural forces await to take readers down the twisted paths found in Book 4 of the bestselling Into the Night series. This collection of paranormal and science fiction short stories will keep readers rivetedâ€¦ and maybe afraid of the dark. Revenge, devious plans, and heroic acts combine to keep what lies around the next corner hidden until the end. Do you know Witch Way to Go?
author: Caroline Giammanco
